Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Damen
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Western, Division, Damen and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Western, Division, Damen and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Ashland
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Ashland due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
